description: An easy homemeade vine-ripened tomato and basil pasta sauce with beef, herb and garlic sausages. This penne pasta will be a hit at dinner time.
name: Speedy Sausage & Tomato Pasta Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 600 g Woolworths beef herb and garlic sausages
800 g Ardmona whole peeled nine ripened tomatoes

recipeInstructions.text: Add pasta and half of the basil leaves to tomato sauce and toss to coat. Top with parmesan and remaining basil leaves. Season with pepper and serve.
